Topic.Title: Thank you Alex, Pertex and the team

Posts.EditableText:
Hello, My name is Mark and I go by the handle Xordevoreaux.

I've been working on a game called "The Mysterious Courtyard" for a while now, and every day I make a promise to myself to get into it and make at least one more addition.
I have watched Quest grow from 4.x to where it is now at 5.2, and I have put a hats off to Alex and the team in my game (at the point where the gamer figures out how to transition out of the prolog into the main game). 

To Alex, thank you, Quest is finally becoming the interactive fiction editor I've dreamed about.  
Thank you, Pertex, for adding the Volume properties that I asked for.  

I'm greatly appreciative and were I not very poor right now I'd donate something to the cause.
Please keep up the good work and I hope to get The Mysterious Courtyard out before the end of year.

Again, thank you.
--xordevoreaux.
